item.title: Appeals court rules Texas has right to build razor wire border wall to deter illegal immigration: 'Huge win'
item.description: A federal appeals court ruled Wednesday that Texas may build a razor wire border wall to deter illegal immigration into the Lone Star State.

item.title: Trump says Mexico will stop flow of migrants after speaking with Mexican president following tariff threats
item.description: President-elect Trump on Wednesday said he had a productive conversation with Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo over the phone.

item.title: Iowa Rep. Mariannette Miller-Meeks beats Dem challenger in state's 1st Congressional District

item.title: Homan taking death threats against him 'more seriously' after Trump officials targeted with violent threats

item.title: Democrat Derek Tran unseats Rep. Michelle Steel in California's 45th Congressional District
